overview.summary: Drive technical excellence and innovation in Azure cloud infrastructure. Lead cross-team initiatives, mentor engineers, and shape the future of cloud computing at global scale.

responsibilities: Design and architect large-scale distributed cloud systems
Lead technical initiatives across multiple engineering teams
Mentor and guide senior engineers and tech leads
Drive adoption of best practices and engineering standards
Collaborate with product management on technical roadmap
Represent Microsoft at technical conferences and industry events
Contribute to open-source projects and technical publications

essential: Deep expertise in distributed systems and cloud architecture
Strong programming skills in C#, Go, or similar languages
Knowledge of networking, security, and infrastructure concepts
Track record of leading large-scale technical projects
preferred: PhD in Computer Science or related field
Experience building cloud platforms or infrastructure
Open-source contributions and technical thought leadership
Previous experience at major cloud providers
Expertise in AI/ML infrastructure and services
